info.title: WSO2 APP Manager - Publisher API
info.description:
This document specifies a **RESTful API** for WSO2 **APP Manager** - Publisher.




It is written with [swagger 2](http://swagger.io/).

get.description: Get a list of available Apps qualifying under a given search condition.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description:
**Search condition**.




You can search in attributes by using an **"attribute:"** modifier.




Eg. "provider:wso2" will match an App if the provider of the App contains "wso2".




Supported attribute modifiers are [*provider, app_name, app_version, app_id**]




If no advanced attribute modifier has been specified, search will match the
given query string against App Name.

200.description:
OK. 
List of qualifying Apps is returned.

Content-Type.description: The content type of the body.

ETag.description: Entity Tag of the response resource. Used by caches, or in conditional requests.

400.description:
Bad Request. 
Invalid request or validation error.

403.description:
Forbidden. 
The request must be conditional but no condition has been specified.

404.description:
Not Found. 
The resource to be updated does not exist.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: App object that needs to be added

201.description:
Created. 
Successful response with the newly created object as entity in the body. 
Location header contains URL of newly created entity.

Location.description: The URL of the newly created resource.

Content-Type.description: The content type of the body.

ETag.description: Entity Tag of the response resource. Used by caches, or in conditional request

400.description:
Bad Request. 
Invalid request or validation error.

415.description:
Unsupported Media Type. 
The entity of the request was in a not supported format.

post.description: Change the lifecycle of an App

parameters.name: action
parameters.description:
The action to demote or promote the state of the App.




Supported actions are [ **Publish,Approve,Reject,Unpublish,Deprecate,Retire,Recycle,Re-Publish,Submit#for#Review **]

ETag.description: Entity Tag of the App. Used by caches, or in conditional request.

Last-Modified.description:
Date and time the App lifecycle has been modified the last time.

      <Apply FunctionId="urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:function:any-of">

         <AttributeValue DataType="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string">admin</AttributeValue>
         <AttributeDesignator AttributeId="http://wso2.org/claims/role" Category="urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:1.0:subject-category:access-subject" DataType="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#string" MustBePresent="true"/>

</Condition>
</Rule>","policyPartialName": policy1,"isSharedPartial": true,"policyPartialDesc": null,,"policyPartialId": 1}

appId.name: appId
appId.description:
**APP ID** consisting of the **UUID** of the App. 
The combination of the provider of the app, name of the appId and the version is also accepted as a valid App ID.
Should be formatted as **provider-name-version**.

appType.name: appType
appType.description: App Type. Either webapp or mobileapp

appId-Q.name: appId
appId-Q.description:
**appId ID** consisting of the **UUID** of the App. 
The combination of the provider of the appId, name of the appId and the version is also accepted as a valid App ID.
Should be formatted as **provider-name-version**.

isGlobal.name: isGlobal
isGlobal.description: Either global policy or not. Default value is 'true'.

fieldFilter.name: field-filter
fieldFilter.description:
Used to limit the fields in response.




Supported filters are [ **basic,all**]

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Maximum size of resource array to return.

offset.name: offset
offset.description: Starting point within the complete list of items qualified.

Accept.name: Accept
Accept.description: Media types acceptable for the response. Default is JSON.

Content-Type.name: Content-Type
Content-Type.description: Media type of the entity in the body. Default is JSON.

If-None-Match.name: If-None-Match
If-None-Match.description:
Validator for conditional requests; based on the ETag of the formerly retrieved
variant of the resourec.

If-Modified-Since.name: If-Modified-Since
If-Modified-Since.description:
Validator for conditional requests; based on Last Modified header of the 
formerly retrieved variant of the resource.

If-Match.name: If-Match
If-Match.description: Validator for conditional requests; based on ETag.

If-Unmodified-Since.name: If-Unmodified-Since
If-Unmodified-Since.description: Validator for conditional requests; based on Last Modified header.

next.description:
Link to the next subset of resources qualified. 
Empty if no more resources are to be returned.

previous.description:
Link to the previous subset of resources qualified. 
Empty if current subset is the first subset returned.

If there are more than one error list them out. 
For example, list out validation errors by each field.
